page.title: 14PUBLIC ATTITUDES TO THE AREA
page.content: better park in the area as the only one is in Crossland Road,and most of the tarmac is broken and it is not really big enough for the area.There are also many busy roads in the area and these require Pelican Crossings. There are no sports centres in the area for either indoor or outdoor activities such as bowling greens,tennis courts or badminton and basketball courts for indoor use in winter time. There are insufficient bus shelters of public telephones in the area.The streets could be kept a lot cleaner as there always appears to be litter scattered in the area.
